腭，口腔的上膛，包括硬腭与软腭。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin palatum

entry.def: Your palate is the top part of the inside of your mouth.

entry.tran: （对美食或美酒的）品尝力；味觉
entry.def: You can refer to someone's palate as a way of talking about their ability to judge good food or drink.

example.ex: ...fresh pasta sauces to tempt more demanding palates.
example.tran: 诱惑较为挑剔的食客的新鲜意面调味酱

means.word_mean: 1. the upper surface of the mouth that separates the oral and nasal cavities
